name: OtherHealthCareFacility
title: Other Health Care Facility
description: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains SNOMEDCT codes for for environments of care representing post-acute and psychiatric settings.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Encounter. The intent of this data element is to identify an  admission source or discharge disposition of an other health care facility.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes representing extended care facilities, intermediate care facilities, LTACHs, nursing homes, skilled nursing facilities, veterans homes, and psychiatric hospitals.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes representing acute inpatient and outpatient environments of care.)

concept.display: Intermediate care hospital for mentally retarded (environment)
